answers.answer: I failed my one hour test but passed the 3 hour one.  It's common to fail the first test. It can mainly be controlled with your diet...You'll meet with a dietician. You'll have to check your sugar levels a few times a day.

Well I'm going back on Monday to take the 3 hour one hopefully I do passed it!! And really? No really drastic changes or anything? I'm worried because I heated it increases stillbirth I don't know if that's true or not but I had a stillbirth already so I'm just worried and streessed.

I have gestational diabetes  it's scary but if u do have it ur Dr's will watch u very closely I'm 34 weeks as soon as I found out at 28 wks I had to see an endocrinologist for my sugar they gave me a meter to monitor my sugar levels I also had to go see a dietician so I could learn what would spike my sugar and how much of what is ok .. I'm also on metformin 850 2 times a day I have to call my endocrinologist every 2 weeks to report my numbers so if my sugar is getting higher he can adjust my meds since 32wks I see my OB wkly for ultra sounds and non stress tests. It can Increase ur risks but when you work w ur Dr's to keep ur sugar levels and diet under control ur risks are then just as high as anyone else's. Also there's lots of ppl that fail the 1hr and pass the 3 good luck momma try not to stress
Thank you! And I'm hoping I do pass it! And have you had any complications or everything ha as gone normally for you??  Also are you going to be induced earlier??

Everything's going pretty normal for me can't complain really .. and yes my Dr said if I haven't had him by 39wks he will induce me .. I was borderline w my first so they couldn't say I had it so I didn't watch my diet or anything when he was born he had extremely low blood sugar and they had to monitor him closely. . Fingers crossed my baby doesn't have that problem this time since I'm being monitored. . Other wise I think everything will be ok
Well I hope everything goes good for you and the baby!!! I'm going for my 3 hour test today I'm super nervous!

So if u fail the 1 hour but pass the 3 hour r u diabetic cuz I failed the 1 hour? I'm 28 weeks they haven't tested me cuz I had a tooth pulled and they dont want the sugar in the wound but I go in for it later on this week...I'm worried about it also cuz diabeties runs in my family both sides

question: So I just received a call from my doctor that I didn't pass the one hour glucose test!:( I am freaking out I do not want to have diabetes"!!:( any of you ladies that do have it What have you had to do differently?????
title: gd
